endpoints.description: Retrieve the quality settings for a specific streaming session.
Initiate a new streaming session with the provided parameters.
Update the configuration of an ongoing streaming session.
Fetch viewer engagement analytics for a specific content.
Retrieve a summary of analytics data for the platform.
Configure caching settings for a specific geographical region.
Check the status and metrics for regional content caching.
Set adaptive bitrate settings for improved content delivery.
Obtain the current bitrate used during the streaming session.
Terminate an ongoing streaming session gracefully.
